job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_details.full_text:
Application Support Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
     * AI Training and Improvement: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
     * Cutting-Edge AI Integration: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
     * Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role, * Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on supporting and improving AI systems rather than developing or engineering them. While it involves interacting with AI and fine-tuning, the core responsibilities are centered around customer support and ticket resolution, which aligns with using AI tools to enhance productivity rather than building AI solutions. The role does not demonstrate the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer, such as algorithm development, model training from scratch, or building user-facing applications powered by generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve' indicates a need to understand the customer support context and how AI can be applied to meet business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions' directly relates to adapting or improving existing AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies' involves developing and evaluating new technical approaches, which can be considered a form of software development or integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'improving the AI system' based on analysis of escalated tickets suggests a role in maintaining and enhancing the performance of AI systems in a production-like environment.

soft_skills.phrase: we are aware this is aggressive
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
